nhc_headline: ...CONDITIONS TO SOON DETERIORATE FOR THE YUCATAN PENINSULA... ...HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, AND DAMAGING WAVES EXPECTED TO BEGIN SHORTLY...
summary:
...CONDITIONS TO SOON DETERIORATE FOR THE YUCATAN PENINSULA... ...HURRICANE-FORCE WINDS, DANGEROUS STORM SURGE, AND DAMAGING WAVES EXPECTED TO BEGIN SHORTLY...
 As of 1:00 AM CDT Fri Jul 5
 the center of Beryl was located near 19.8, -86.2
 with movement W at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 971 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 115 mph.
